lead_paragraph: The San Francisco 49ers traded the backup quarterback Cody Pickett to the Houston Texans yesterday for a conditional draft pick. Pickett, a former rodeo cowboy, started two games for the 49ers last season and completed a franchise-low one pass in a loss to Chicago.
